growthexperiments-homepage-startediting-: When {{GENDER:|you}} created {{GENDER:|your}} account, {{GENDER:|you}} said {{GENDER:|you}} wanted to fix a typo or error. Here, {{GENDER:|you}} can find suggestions of small edits to get started. If {{GENDER:|you}} would rather go straight to fixing a specific article, {{GENDER:|you}} can search for the article and click '{{int:vector-view-edit}}'.

When {{GENDER:|you}} created {{GENDER:|your}} account, {{GENDER:|you}} said {{GENDER:|you}} wanted to add or change information on an existing article. Here, {{GENDER:|you}} can find suggestions of small edits to get started. If {{GENDER:|you}} would rather go straight to changing a specific article, {{GENDER:|you}} can search for the article and click '{{int:vector-view-edit}}'.
tag-help_module_question-description: Edit made from the homepage help module's 'Ask a question' feature
tag-mentorship_module_question-descripti: Edit made from the homepage mentorship module's 'Ask your mentor' feature
tag-mentorship_panel_question-descriptio: Edit made from the help panel's 'Ask your mentor' feature
tag-newcomer_task_copyedit-description: 'Copyedit' task edit suggested by the suggested edits module of the newcomer homepage
tag-newcomer_task_references-description: 'References' task edit suggested by the suggested edits module of the newcomer homepage
tag-newcomer_task_update-description: 'Update' task edit suggested by the suggested edits module of the newcomer homepage
tag-newcomer_task_expand-description: 'Expand' task edit suggested by the suggested edits module of the newcomer homepage
tag-newcomer_task_links-description: 'Links' task edit suggested by the suggested edits module of the newcomer homepage
tag-newcomer_task_add_link-description: 'Add link' task edit suggested by the suggested edits module of the newcomer homepage
tag-newcomer_task_image_suggestion-descr: 'Add images' task edit suggested by the suggested edits module of the newcomer homepage
tag-newcomer_task_section_image_suggesti: 'Add images to sections' task edit suggested by the suggested edits module of the newcomer homepage
growthexperiments-homepage-mentorship-qu: When you ask a question, it gets published publicly under {{GENDER:$2|your}} username, '$2', to $3, which is where {{GENDER:$1|he|she|they}} can find and respond to your question.
growthexperiments-homepage-enable-prefer: To enable the newcomer homepage, visit your 'Newcomer editor features' settings in [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-personal-homepage|Preferences]].
growthexperiments-homepage-suggestededit: Change {{GENDER:$1|your}} filter settings to 'Match at least one selected topic' for more results

Suggestions are generated by machine. The images are from Wikimedia Commons, Wikipedia's collection of freely licenced images.
{{GENDER:$1|You}} will decide whether to add them to the article. {{GENDER:$1|You}} will also write a caption for them.
Choose the option to 'Match all selected topics' for more specific results
Invalid suggested edits configuration for task type '$1': '$2' must be an integer
Invalid suggested edits configuration for task type '$1': '$2' must be larger than $3
Invalid suggested edits configuration for task type '$1': '$2' must be an array
Invalid suggested edits configuration for task type '$1' field '$2': maximum $3 elements allowed
Invalid suggested edits configuration: invalid title '$1'
growthexperiments-addlink-invalidjson: Link recommendation service response for '$1' is invalid
growthexperiments-addlink-serviceerror: Link recommendation service responded with an error for '$1': $2
growthexperiments-addlink-duplicatesubmi: Tried to submit link suggestion reviews for revision '$1' which has already been reviewed.
growthexperiments-addlink-rejectiondialo: Text should include more or fewer words (e.g. 'palm tree' instead of 'palm')
Linking to wrong article (e.g. linking 'moon' to 'planet')
growthexperiments-addsectionimage-inspec: Add this image to the article section '$1'?
growthexperiments-addimage-onboarding-co: Images come from Wikimedia Commons, a collection of freely licenced images used by Wikipedia.
growthexperiments-addsectionimage-onboar: Images come from Wikimedia Commons, a collection of freely licenced images used by Wikipedia.
growthexperiments-addimage-summary-copyr: By saving changes, {{GENDER:|you}} agree to the [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use] and agree to release your contribution under the [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0] and [https://www.gnu.org/licenses/fdl-1.3.html GFDL 1.3] licences.
